name: Madura
startIntroPart1: Prince Trunajaya, you led Madurese people in the heroic struggle for independence against foreign power of Mataram, and with the help of Karaeng Galesong, even managed to sack their Keraton at Plered and chase them all the way to Cirebon
startIntroPart2: O prince Trunajaya, Panembahan Maduretna Panatagama, your people yearn for the past time when Madura spanned proudly from the Island all the way to Cirebon. Will you lead your army across the island, and bring back glory and victory? Will your new empire stand the test of History?
declaringWar: Now face me like a man! come back as a victor or die with honor!
attacked: Oh senika ghi, let's make our fight glorious!
defeated: Lebbi baghus pote tolang, atembang pote mata!
introduction: I am Trunajaya, prince of Madura, and conqueror of Mataram!
uniques: Retain [50]% of the happiness from [Salt] after the last copy has been traded away
